pr_title: add genome nexus annotation sources to portal.properties

timeline.bodyText: @leexgh Question re consistency. In the above property (show.genomenexus) we spell genomenexus without underscore. Are there other properties where we use genome_nexus? Otherwise maybe better to keep it consistent and make it show.genomenexus.annotation_sources?
timeline.author: inodb

replies.bodyText: @inodb good point, I'll change to genomenexus to be consistent with others
replies.author: leexgh

timeline.message: add genome nexus annotation sources to portal.properties
add genome nexus annotation sources to portal.properties
